name: Haunt (itch) (PurpleML, LunaKittyWitch)
description:
Explore an ancient temple full of mirrors, magic, and evil spirits! Can you descend to the bottom of the bullet- spell dungeon while gaining different powerups each run? 

Controls

  • Movement: WASD
  • Aim: Mouse Movement
  • Fire: Left Mouse Button (hold to charge shot)
  • Dash: Space
  • Interact: E (used for collecting powers and progressing to next stage

Made for Mini Jam 103!

Made by Team Moonbloom over 3 days!

Seeing as the theme was darkness, the majority of the game takes place in dark ruins only lit by the projectiles of you and your enemies.

To incorporate the "You are your own worst enemy" limitation, we leaned into the chaos of bullet-hell scenarios by making it so you have to dodge your own attacks in addition to those of your enemies!
